sn1.75:4.1: “Why are so many people here afraid,
sn1.75:4.2: when the path has been taught with so many dimensions?
sn1.75:4.3: I ask you, Gotama, whose wisdom is vast:
sn1.75:4.4: Standing on what need one not fear the next world?”
sn1.75:5.1: “When speech and mind are directed right,
sn1.75:5.2: and you don’t do anything bad with the body
sn1.75:5.3: while dwelling at home with plenty of food and drink.
sn1.75:5.6: standing on the teaching one need not fear the next world.”
